categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars voice actors

nodes.text: James Wesley Marsters (born August 20, 1962) is an American actor and voice artist best-known for his portrayal of the vampire Spike in the hit TV series Buffy the Vampire Slayer. He vocally appeared as Captain Faro Argyus in Star Wars: The Clone Wars opposite Corey Burton. In the series, he gave his character of Captain Argyus a "stuffy accent" because he wanted to portray the character as arrogant.
